method.name: (Globals)
OnSaveData

properties.hintText: eg: &[opencall_match.status] = 4 OR '&[opencall_match.suppgroup]' = '1STLINE' will only send if a call is on hold or with 1st line. [Please use the full ampersand notation with opencall_match (as in the example) for this to work - blank will always be true]

eg: lefttable.flg_manager=1 AND lefttable.fk_dept_code LIKE 'IT%' [Please note that this will be fed to the database directly, so properly escape characters if need be. Also whatever the actual table name is (given above) USE lefttable instead (the fieldnames should reflect the actual fieldnames).]

eg: righttable.flg_manager=1 AND righttable.fk_dept_code LIKE 'IT%' [Please note that this will be fed to the database directly, so properly escape characters if need be. Also whatever the actual table name is (given above) USE righttable instead (the fieldnames should reflect the actual fieldnames).]

appearance.caption: Left Field (to match with Main Call Field)
Left Field to Use (contains email if no Right Database)
